openPositions.title: Product & Marketing Career Days 2025
openPositions.summary:
You’re invited to Dream Games Career Days!

If you are a 4th-year university student, take your first step into the mobile gaming industry. Join our event for an opportunity to learn from our engineering teams and gain valuable insights into the game development process. In this event, you will also get some hands-on experience and explore our new grad positions.

This event will be held on 1st March at Four Seasons Hotel Bosphorus. We are pleased to host with accommodation and arrange travel for those joining us from outside Istanbul.

Fill out the application form and ensure that you complete your application by the 3rd of January.

openPositions.title: Product Specialist
openPositions.summary:
We are looking for a passionate Product Specialist to join our team. As a Product Specialist, you will ensure the game's success and growth by contributing to developing the product roadmap. In the studio, you will work closely with engineers and artists to create games that will be played by millions of people all around the world.

At Dream Games, all team members have a genuine chance to contribute to the final product and have an impact on the company. If you want to be a team member of a fast-growing company, you might be the person we are looking for!

openPositions.title: Game Developer
openPositions.summary:
We are looking for a passionate Game Developer to join our team. You will contribute to all areas of game development, including programming of graphics, game logic, and user interface using Unity. You will work effectively as part of a multi-disciplinary team of developers, artists, and game designers to create games that will be played by millions of people all around the world.

At Dream Games, all team members have a genuine chance to contribute to the final product and have an impact on the company. If you want to be a team member of a fast-growing company, you might be the person we are looking for!

openPositions.title: Senior Software Engineer
openPositions.summary:
We are looking for an experienced Senior Software Engineer to join our team. You will contribute to all areas of game development, including programming of graphics, game logic, and user interface using Unity. It is not required to have prior game development experience since we believe a competent software engineer can develop great things in any field. You will work effectively as part of a multi-disciplinary team of engineers, artists and game designers to create games that will be played by millions of people all around the world.

At Dream Games, all team members have a genuine chance to contribute to the final product and have an impact on the company. If you want to be a team member of a fast-growing company, you might be the person we are looking for!

openPositions.title: Software Engineer, Tools
openPositions.summary:
We are looking for a Software Engineer to join our tools engineering team. You will make architectural decisions and do hands-on development to create tools and infrastructure for more reliable, faster, and fun games. You will work closely with a multi-disciplinary team of engineers, artists, and game designers to help create games that millions of people worldwide will play.

At Dream Games, all team members have a genuine chance to contribute to the final product and have an impact on the company. If you want to be a team member of a fast-growing company, you might be the person we are looking for!

openPositions.title: Senior Backend Engineer
openPositions.summary:
We are looking for a Senior Backend Engineer to join our team. As a Senior Backend Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, deploying the large-scale backend architecture of mobile games. In this role, by working with TechOps, you will develop highly scalable technologies that allow millions of users to play our games. You will also work closely with the game development team to do what’s best for the games.

At Dream Games, all team members have a genuine chance to contribute to the final product and have an impact on the company. If you want to be a team member of a fast-growing company, you might be the person we are looking for!

openPositions.title: Software Engineer, Performance Marketing
openPositions.summary:
We are looking for an experienced Software Engineer to join our performance marketing team. As a Software Engineer, you will modify and iterate on the gameplay to create playable ads. You will need to be creative to make games as attractive as possible for the advertising campaigns and take on considerable ownership and responsibility. You will work closely with marketing managers and artists to create playable ads that millions of people will play worldwide.

At Dream Games, all team members have a genuine chance to contribute to the final product and have an impact on the company. If you want to be a team member of a fast-growing company, you might be the person we are looking for!

openPositions.summary:
We are looking for a Marketing Analytics Manager to join our team. As a Marketing Analytics Manager, you will play a crucial role in shaping our marketing strategies through data-driven insights and collaborating with cross-functional teams to provide insights to enhance user acquisition and the effectiveness of both performance and brand marketing campaigns.

At Dream Games, all team members have a genuine chance to contribute to the final product and have an impact on the company. If you want to be a team member of a fast-growing company, you might be the person we are looking for!

openPositions.title: Senior Marketing Analyst
openPositions.summary:
We are looking for a talented and collaborative Creative Manager to contribute to developing content across Royal Match and Royal Kingdom. As a Creative Manager, you will be responsible for creating, developing, and delivering inspiring advertising that ensures a regular pipeline of world-class content for the US and other tier-1 markets with one of the largest marketing budgets in the gaming industry. You should have the curiosity and humility to understand the context of current category success drivers while bringing your creativity and experience to the process. You will also work with the brand and performance marketing team to create innovative concepts and scripts for digital media and TV.

At Dream Games, all team members have a genuine chance to contribute to the final product and have an impact on the company. If you want to be a team member of a fast-growing company, you might be the person we are looking for!
